body_html:
OK, the requested 'abstract' refactor has been done. It's the commit stack on top of the megacommit.

  • There is now an 'abstract' field exposed from 'Declarations.yaml'
  • gen_variable_type.py uses this to figure out how to do dispatch
  • I took the opportunity to do some refactoring in the ATen and PyTorch codegen files; this was mostly a renaming exercise to make the new concept of 'abstractness' come out more clearly.
body_text:
OK, the requested 'abstract' refactor has been done. It's the commit stack on top of the megacommit.

There is now an 'abstract' field exposed from 'Declarations.yaml'
gen_variable_type.py uses this to figure out how to do dispatch
I took the opportunity to do some refactoring in the ATen and PyTorch codegen files; this was mostly a renaming exercise to make the new concept of 'abstractness' come out more clearly.
body:
OK, the requested 'abstract' refactor has been done. It's the commit stack on top of the megacommit.

- There is now an 'abstract' field exposed from 'Declarations.yaml'
- gen_variable_type.py uses this to figure out how to do dispatch
- I took the opportunity to do some refactoring in the ATen and PyTorch codegen files; this was mostly a renaming exercise to make the new concept of 'abstractness' come out more clearly.
